summary: The Pevensie siblings return to Narnia, where they are enlisted to once again help ward off an evil king and restore the rightful heir to the land's throne, Prince Caspian.
cast: Ben Barnes|Georgie Henley|Skandar Keynes|William Moseley|Anna Popplewell|Sergio Castellitto|Peter Dinklage|Warwick Davis|Vincent Grass|Pierfrancesco Favino|Cornell John|Damián Alcázar|Alicia Borrachero|Simón Andreu|Predrag Bjelac|David Bowles|Juan Diego Montoya|Douglas Gresham|Ashley Jones|Klára Issová|Shane Rangi|Curtis Matthew|Mana Hira Davis|Winham Hammond|Hana Frejková|Kristina Beranova|Lucie Solarova|Karolina Matouskova|Alina Phelan|Joseph Moore|Isaac Bell|Lejla Abbasová|Ephraim Goldin|Yemi Akinyemi|Carlos Silva Da Silva|Gomez Sandoval|Jan Filipenský|David Mottl|Michaela Dvorska|John Bach|Jack Walley|Marcus O'Donovan|Adam Valdez|Josh Campbell|Sim Evan-Jones|Harry Gregson-Williams|Eddie Izzard|Liam Neeson|Ken Stott|Tilda Swinton|David Walliams|Booda|Siobhan Connors|Rob Derry|Peter Dillon|Tim Glanfield|Tim Hands|Jeff Himmel|Vit Sky
keywords: narnia|king|good versus evil|brother sister relationship|brother brother relationship
title: Las crónicas de Narnia: El príncipe Caspian
